settings.title: Ciao Bel Fiore Candles
settings.text: Ciao Bel Fiore is a home-based artistry in Dayton, Ohio established in May of 2020. At Ciao, creator and artist, Ashley Graham, individually designs and handcrafts 100% soy, floral topped candles. Each candle created at Ciao, is nestled within a repurposed vessel and adorned with an intentionally designed crown of flowers and other natural components. Every candle has the potential to set the mood in any room of your home and is sure to make a statement, both visually and with it’s gourmand scent profile.

settings.title: Wild Roots Creative Jewelry
settings.text: Ali, a Dayton-based jewelry designer, reignited her passion for crafting unique pieces after an inspiring encounter at a Texas State Park. She balances her life in Dayton with six-month RV travels, drawing inspiration from America's diverse landscapes. Ali sources materials from local bead shops along her journey and creates jewelry that captures the essence of her adventures, often naming her pieces after the memorable locations she visits.

settings.title: Curated Gift Baskets
settings.text: A crafted exclusive collection of gift baskets that embody the essence of luxury and comfort. Each basket is a symphony of handpicked delights, thoughtfully composed to create the perfect gift. Whether for a loved one, a business associate, or as a treat to yourself, these baskets are more than gifts—they are an experience, an expression of refinement and grace. They are an invitation to pause, savor, and indulge in the finer things in life.

Ciao Bel Fiore - Ashley individually designs and handcrafts 100% soy, floral topped candles and many other sustainable home goods out of her home here in Dayton. Each candle is crafted in a repurposed vessel, featuring a unique floral crown and natural elements. These Candles, known for their striking visuals and rich scents, enhance the ambiance of any room.

Wild Roots Creative - Ali, a Dayton-based jewelry designer, reignited her passion for crafting unique pieces after an inspiring encounter at a Texas State Park. She balances her life in Dayton with six-month RV travels, drawing inspiration from America's diverse landscapes. Ali sources materials from local bead shops and creates jewelry that captures the essence of her journeys, often naming her pieces after the memorable locations she visits.

Curated Baskets - Charm your friends with The Parlor's Curated Gift Baskets, an exquisite blend of local sophistication and artisanal allure. Every basket is carefully assembled with a selection of premium items, crafted to provide a lavish gift-giving experience. More than just presents, these baskets are experiences in themselves, curated to honor memorable occasions and valued relationships. Ideal for any friend, our Curated Gift Baskets capture the essence of luxury, local artisanship, and The Parlor's inviting warmth
